title: Title
myLocationNotAuthorized: The acquisition of the geolocation information failed because the page did not have the permission to do it.
myLocationError: The acquisition of the geolocation failed because one or several internal sources of position returned an internal error.
myLocationTimeout: The time allowed to acquire the geolocation was reached before the information was obtained.
myLocationSelectOption: Select the 'View Location' option to enable viewing of your position.
heading: Direção
searchByCoordinateInfo: Click on the map to obtain the coordinates or enter their values ​​using the following form.
identifyNoResults: No results. Click on the map to identify.
measureInfoDistance:
1. to start measuring, click on the map at the initial location
2. to measure a route click on the intermediate locations
3. to finish, double-click
measureInfoArea:
1. to start measuring, click on the map at a starting location
2. continue clicking on the locations that define the area
3. to finish, double-click
measureMsgContinuePolygon: Click to continue drawing the polygon
measureMsgContinueLine: Click to continue drawing the line
